nodes.text: This spaceport was located on the planet Tammuz-an.

The spaceport serviced civilian and military spacecraft. It was situated inside the capital city of Tammuz-an and was an important link to the outside galaxy. Mon Julpa and his companions landed here during his bid to become King of Tammuz-an. Prince Coby took a passenger flight to Chuzalla from this spaceport when he was preparing to enlist in the Imperial Academy.
